help:
Available options:
	a	Add a song
	s	Search for song(s)
	p	Print song list
	r	Search and remove song(s)
	fo	Read data from text file
	fob	Read data from binary file
	fw	Write data to text file
	fwb	Write data to binary file
	fc	Change filename for text file
	fcb	Change filename for binary file
	cl	Change to Polish
	e	Exit
criteria_help:
al	Album
	ar	Artist
	t	Title
	y	Year
title: Title
ensure: Are you sure you want to remove listed songs? [y/N]:
